title: Two persons killed in separate accidents
byline: Two persons were killed and two others injured in separate train accidents yesterday (19).

title: India’s sword-wielding grandmother still going strong at 82
byline: India’s sword-wielding grandmother still going strong at 82An 82-year-old woman who teaches the ancient Indian martial art of Kalaripayattu says she has no plans to retire.

title: Brazilian teacher nabbed at BIA with cocaine worth Rs. 240 Mn
byline: A Brazilian national was arrested by the Narcotics Control Unit at the Bandaranaike International Airport (BIA) early this morning while attempting to smuggle in nearly 5 kilograms of cocaine worth around Rs. 240 million.

title: More devotees expected in Kandy, people advised to avoid today
byline: Police advised people to refrain from arriving in Kandy today to venerate and pay their respects to the Sacred Tooth Relic as more than 100,000 devotees are expected to arrive in Kandy by this morning.

title: Fairly heavy showers expected in parts of the island
byline: The Meteorology Department forecast showers or thundershowers at several places in the Central, Sabaragamuwa, Uva and Eastern Provinces and in the Polonnaruwa, Hambantota and Mullaittivu districts during the afternoon or night.
